reviewText: Wasn't able to play the movies because they were only for Blu-ray players made in Asia
didn't work in my br player in usa

This Blu Ray box set of TWD seasons 1-6 contains the English / International versions of eOne and FOX international Channels and won't play on US players! To play these International version discs you will need a region B coded or code free Blu Ray player! Same for DVD. They are coded Region 2 and won't play in the US either. Next bad point: Unfortunately  parts 2,3,4 and 5 of season 1 are heavily cut. The box set is NOT unrated!!! If you want to watch all parts uncut you have to buy the US version by AMC.
The English box is rated 18 but not uncut!!!!!!! Watch out please.

I did get the dvds but they do not play on my blu ray or xbox 360. Only on pc.
They came from ireland.. The encoding is not supported.

Be careful with this one!!...
Its an "International" DVD set, so an ordinary DVD player has to be "reprogrammed"  for your country, or Region.
I didn't know that,  but I went on YouTube , and they told me how to program my DVD, for that region,....and it worked!!
Suffice it to say, I ABSOLUTELY LOVE THESE DVDs!!
They came to me perfect!!
I will get more international DVDs now, ..they're cheaper too!

Excellent quality. Loved the special features and extended
unrated episodes. Good price same version in Aus was $200 dearer and that includes shipping cost very happy.

This is a winner,the price is exceptional.
Keep in mind this will only play with region B blu-ray player.
